        Constructor of SmallShip for player
        Parameters:
        selected: - the selected status of the ship
        positioned: - the positioned status of the ship
        rotation: - the rotation status of the ship
        rowOnBoard: - the row of the ship on board
        colOnBoard: - the column of the ship on board
        player: - which player's ship is
        stbpPane: - the JPanel where the available to be placed on board player's ships are
        row: - the row of the ship before it's placed on board
        boardPane: - the column of the ship before it's placed on board
        spFrame: - the JFrame where the player places his ships on board
